Types of Eating Disorders There are two major kinds of [eating disorders](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/eating-disorders) and the treatment of these disorders is possible with homeopathic treatment. [Anorexia](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/anorexia) Nervosa: A mental dietary problem wherein the person does not eat enough, regardless of the amount of appetite they have. He or she, in the long run, loses enough weight to wind up being skinny. [Bulimia](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/bulimia): Bulimia, also known as bulimia nervosa, is a condition wherein a person has an urge to binge eating and has a constant craving for consuming food. It is then followed by [vomiting](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/vomiting) that is self-induced or done by using laxatives.
